item.title: 英国富时 100 指数（FTSE 100）将上扬结束动荡一周
还记得特朗普交易吗？三周前的交易
item.description:
市场似乎随着他的机会而起伏，但这或许更多是基于确定性，而非对政策的亲和力。【原文：

Markets seem to rise and fall with his chances, but perhaps that’s based more on certainty than affinity for policies.

】

item.title: 法国失业率意外下降为马克龙打气
item.description: 法国第二季度失业率意外下降，这表明埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统不受欢迎的劳动力市场改革正在取得一些成果。【原文：French unemployment unexpectedly declined in the second quarter, a sign that President Emmanuel Macron’s unpopular labor-market reforms are bringing some results.】

item.title: 英国国家环境基金（BNEF）称，随着中国进口激增，巴基斯坦将迎来太阳能热潮
item.description: 据 BloombergNEF 报道，在中国进口激增的推动下，巴基斯坦的太阳能市场正在蓬勃发展。【原文：Pakistan’s market for solar power is booming, propelled by a surge in imports from China, according to BloombergNEF.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 液化天然气建造商计划在英国新建终端，帮助减少对欧洲的依赖
item.description: 该项目开发商表示，由于需求不断增长，而且英国希望摆脱对欧洲管道供应的依赖，因此英国是进口液化天然气新终端的理想候选国。【原文：The UK is a good candidate for a new terminal to import liquefied natural gas because of growing demand and the desire to kick its dependency on pipeline supplies from Europe, the project developer said.】

item.title: 日元反弹，摩根大通携手瑞银下调日股目标价
item.description: 由于日元走强，摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. strategists have joined their peers at UBS Group AG in lowering year-end targets for Japan’s key stock gauges because of the stronger yen.】

item.title: 印度两年来最大规模首次公开募股后，Ola 电器跃升 11
item.description: 周五，Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. 的股价在孟买首次亮相时大涨，原因是该国电动汽车的采用率不断提高，投资者需求强劲。【原文：Ola Electric Mobility Ltd.’s shares surged in their Mumbai debut on Friday, backed by strong investor demand amid growing adoption for electric vehicles in the country.】

item.title: 纽约银行称，由于日元过于低廉，套利交易退潮将进一步加剧
item.description: 据纽约银行称，日元套利交易的平仓还有进一步的空间，随着时间的推移，日币可能会升值至 1 美元兑 100 日元。【原文：Unwinding of yen-funded carry trades has further room to run and the Japanese currency may strengthen toward 100 per dollar over time, according to BNY.】

item.title: 可可价格上涨，吉百利青蛙和考拉巧克力价格翻倍
item.description: 在可可价格飙升之后，吉百利澳大利亚公司将其Freddo Frogs和Caramello Koalas巧克力的价格提高了一倍，这是该公司十多年来首次调整产品成本。【原文：Cadbury Australia has doubled the price of its Freddo Frogs and Caramello Koalas chocolates after a surge in cocoa prices, the first time the company has adjusted the cost of the products in over a decade.】

item.title: 英镑大涨因降息和市场动荡而消退
item.description: 工党赢得大选后，英镑赢得了新的拥趸。现在，货币交易员们正在寻找在压力增加的情况下保持乐观的理由。【原文：Sterling won new fans after the Labour Party’s election win. Now, currency traders are looking for reasons to stay optimistic as pressure mounts.】

item.title: 瑞典公寓价格下跌影响住房市场复苏
item.description: 瑞典公寓价格在7月份逆转了近期的部分涨势，表明在经历了2022年的溃败之后，住房市场的复苏之路依然崎岖不平。【原文：Swedish apartment prices reversed a part of their recent gains in July, suggesting the housing market’s road to recovery remains bumpy after a 2022 rout.】

item.title: 电动摩托车巨头 Ola 为印度两年来最大规模上市做好准备
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 亚洲股市反弹，比特币反弹至 60,000 美元上方
item.description: 上周五，比特币继续反弹，亚洲股市也随之反弹。【原文：Bitcoin continued to rally in tandem with a rebound in Asian equities on Friday after a bruising selloff.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴和腾讯将提供中国经济格局快照
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司、腾讯控股有限公司和 JD.com Inc.将为中国经济和消费者情绪提供一个缩影，因为预计该地区又将迎来一个低迷的财报季。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd., Tencent Holdings Ltd. and JD.com Inc. will provide a snapshot of China’s economy and consumer sentiment, as another somber earnings season is expected in the region.】

item.title: 印度财报电话会议热浪提及率创历史新高
item.description: 印度炎热的夏季是已经受到盈利增长放缓和供应链持续中断打击的公司的最新担忧。【原文：India’s sweltering summer is the latest worry for companies already hit by slowing earnings growth and ongoing supply chain disruptions.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司与巴西达成税收和解后维持股息不变
item.description: 巴西国有控股石油生产商巴西石油公司（Petroleo Brasileiro SA）批准了 136 亿雷亚尔（24.5 亿美元）的第二季度股息，低于首席执行官玛格达-尚布里亚特（Magda Chambriard）的首份业绩预期。【原文：Brazil’s state-controlled oil producer Petroleo Brasileiro SA approved 13.6 billion reais ($2.45 billion) in second-quarter dividends that fell short of expectations in the first results under Chief Executive Officer Magda Chambriard.】

item.title: 压力增大，印度卢比的新红线正在形成
item.description: 据分析师称，印度央行似乎已经为卢比在 84 美元兑 1 美元的水平上划定了新的底线。【原文：India’s central bank looks to have drawn a new line in the sand for the rupee at the 84-per-dollar level, according to analysts.】

item.title: 嘉能可的扩张成本抵消了创纪录的财富部门收入
item.description: Canaccord Genuity 集团公司第一财季的收益未能达到分析师的预期，原因是招聘和技术投资带来的成本上升盖过了财富管理部门创纪录的收入。【原文：Canaccord Genuity Group Inc.’s earnings missed analysts’ estimates in the fiscal first quarter as higher costs from hiring and technology investments overshadowed record revenue from its wealth-management segment.】

item.title: 人工智能股价暴跌令亚洲投资者寻找下一个催化剂
item.description: 关于人工智能涨势是否已经结束的争论正在激烈进行，但对一些投资者来说，再次缩水可能是一个买入的机会。【原文：Debate is raging on whether the AI rally has run its course but for some investors, another drawdown may be a chance to buy.】

item.title: 现金充裕的买家推动了香港的烂尾楼销售
item.description: 第一太平戴维斯（Savills Plc）的经纪人表示，在资金充裕的买家的帮助下，香港近期连续出现的豪宅不良销售将持续到今年下半年。【原文：Hong Kong’s recent streak of distressed luxury property sales should persist through the rest of the year, helped by buyers flush with cash, according to Savills Plc brokers.】

item.title: 日本央行的 "损害控制 "让交易员猜不透其真正目的
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫上周发出了一个明确的信息：日元疲软是一个风险，利率可能会继续上升。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda had a clear message last week — the weak yen was a risk and rates were likely to keep rising.】

item.title: 摩根大通资产博弈计划：日本央行下一步行动面临加息结束的风险
item.description: 摩根大通资产管理公司称，日本央行将避免在短期内再次加息，进一步收紧利率可能取决于美国经济的命运。【原文：The Bank of Japan will avoid raising interest rates again any time soon, with further tightening likely dependent on the fate of the US economy, according to JPMorgan Asset Management.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美股正在反弹。全球最大的主动型债券管理公司认为前路崎岖。苹果公司计划推出新款 Mac mini。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. US stocks are bouncing back. The world’s biggest active bond manager sees a bumpy road ahead. And Apple’s planning a new Mac mini. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sebastian Boyd】

item.title: 关注中东和股市，石油有望每周上涨
item.description: 石油在连续三日反弹后趋于稳定，交易商在关注中东局势的发展和更广泛市场的反弹。【原文：Oil steadied after a three-day rebound, with traders monitoring developments in the Middle East and a rally in wider markets.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚通胀率降幅超过预期，为 2021 年以来最低
item.description: 哥伦比亚通胀率的放缓幅度超过预期，达到 2021 年以来的最低水平，从而支持了总统古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）关于加快货币宽松政策的呼吁。【原文：Colombian inflation slowed more than forecast to its lowest level since 2021, bolstering President Gustavo Petro’s calls for faster monetary easing.】

item.title: 香港保险业繁荣吸引内地求职者
item.description: 大量来自中国大陆金融和科技行业的专业人士涌入香港，他们对跨境职业和薪资前景感到失望。许多人试图通过兜售保险产品来谋生并留在这座城市，从而推动了这个一度沉寂的行业。【原文：Hong Kong is seeing an influx of professionals from mainland China’s finance and tech sectors who are disillusioned with their career and salary prospects across the border. Many are trying to make a living and stay in the city by peddling insurance products, giving a boost to a once-sleepy industry.】

item.title: 股市崩盘让亚洲新兴市场聚焦中国和马来西亚
item.description: 本周全球股市的动荡促使亚洲股票投资者将目光转向近年来持股比例不断下降的市场，而中国和马来西亚正好符合这一要求。【原文：This week’s upheaval in global equities is prompting investors in Asian stocks to turn their attention to markets where their ownership has been falling in recent years, with China and Malaysia fitting the bill.】

item.title: 中国政策突击显示支持清洁能源的新决心
item.description: 随着对能源安全的担忧减弱，以及政府加大对陷入困境的绿色产业的支持力度，一系列政策声明凸显了中国对加快气候行动的信心不断增强。【原文：A spate of policy announcements highlights China’s rising confidence in accelerating climate action, as fears over energy security wane and the government steps up support for struggling green industries.】

item.title: 魁北克酒店工人希望在合同谈判中将工资提高 36
item.description: 周四，酒店工人在蒙特利尔市中心的双树酒店（DoubleTree）前高呼、歌唱并吹响号角，他们举行罢工，要求在多年通货膨胀加剧后增加工资。【原文：Hotel workers chanted, sang and blew horns in front of the DoubleTree hotel in downtown Montreal as they went on strike Thursday to push for wage increases after years of elevated inflation.】
